summary: This is my personal ENB that i use combined with RCRN 3.5 giving great realism and immersion.
descriptionHtml:
I use so many ENB to give to Skyrim the best realism and immersion. I\'ve never found nothing that could be the \"perfection\" and each ENB had his weakness. So I decide to made an ENB by myself.  I didn\'t create nothing, I\'ve just taken many parts of many ENB and i make a one new.

DESCRIPTION
This is an ENB that use the enbseries file 0.119 (http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm) and provided all his features such sunrays, no shadow striping, better lighting, ecc.... Combined with this ENB i use RCRN 3.5 with all his lighting effects, his sun, reflection, and more.

INSTALLATION

- Install RCRN 3.5 - set RCRN to CLASSIC -(choose manual or automatic) and be care that all the files .esp are installed correctly;
- Install my ENB (remeber to download enbseries 0.119) and overwrite everything.

WARNING - My ENB uses SMAA (set on HIGH, you can raise it until UBER on the file \"injector.ini\") that is a better and more performant antialasing so remeber to deactivate the antaliasing of the game and of your videocard.

WHAT THIS ENB GIVE TO YOU

This ENB give you a great lighting effect, high quality antialiasing, sunrays effects, better shadows, dark and realisting nights (thanks to the guys of RCRN!), and scary dungeons. Check by yourself!

CREDITS

- Bethesda
- RCRN team
- Boris vorontsov for the enb series.
- Andrej for SMAA
- Matso for his features
- Kyokushinoyama
author: Wlart
